00018  * \file     example_packet_transmit.c
00019  *
00020  * \brief    Example code for packet transmission
00021  *
00022  * \details  This example demonstrates the transmission of a packet
00023  *           through a specified port.
00024  *
00025  ************************************************************************/
00026 
00027 #include <stdio.h>
00028 #include <stdlib.h>
00029 #include <string.h>
00030 #include <sal/driver.h>
00031 #include <sal/version.h>
00032 #include <opennsl/error.h>
00033 #include <opennsl/vlan.h>
00034 #include <opennsl/port.h>
00035 #include <opennsl/switch.h>
00036 #include <opennsl/pkt.h>
00037 #include <opennsl/tx.h>
00038 #include <examples/util.h>
00039 
00040 #define DEFAULT_UNIT  0
00041 #define DEFAULT_VLAN  1
00042 #define MAX_DIGITS_IN_CHOICE 5
00043 
00044 char example_usage[] =
00045 "Syntax: example_packet_transmit                                       \n\r"
00046 "                                                                      \n\r"
00047 "Paramaters: None.                                                     \n\r"
00048 "                                                                      \n\r"
00049 "Example: The following command is used to demonstrate transmit and    \n\r"
00050 "         packet API's.                                                \n\r"
00051 "         example_packet_transmit                                      \n\r"
00052 "                                                                      \n\r"
00053 "Usage Guidelines: None.                                               \n\r";
00054 
00055 /*****************************************************************/
00065 int example_pkt_send(int unit, int port, char *data, int len)
00066 {
00067   opennsl_pkt_t *pkt;
00068   int rv;
00069 
00070   rv = opennsl_pkt_alloc(unit, len, 0, &pkt);
00071 
00072   if (OPENNSL_SUCCESS(rv))
00073   {
00074     rv = opennsl_pkt_memcpy(pkt, 0, data, len);
00075     if (!OPENNSL_SUCCESS(rv))
00076     {
00077       opennsl_pkt_free(unit, pkt);
00078       return rv;
00079     }
00080 
00081     OPENNSL_PBMP_PORT_SET(pkt->tx_pbmp, port);
00082 
00083     rv = opennsl_tx(unit, pkt, NULL);
00084     if (!OPENNSL_SUCCESS(rv))
00085     {
00086       opennsl_pkt_free(unit, pkt);
00087       return rv;
00088     }
00089   }
00090   opennsl_pkt_free(unit, pkt);
00091   return rv;
00092 }
00093 /* __doxy_func_body_end__ */
00094 
00095 
00096 /*****************************************************************/
00105 void example_multi_pkt_send(int unit, int port, int count)
00106 {
00107   int i;
00108   int rv;
00109   char data[] = {0xff, 0xff, 0xff, 0xff, 0xff, 0xff, 0x82, 0x2f,
00110                  0x2e, 0x42, 0x46, 0x74, 0x08, 0x06, 0x00, 0x01,
00111                  0x08, 0x00, 0x06, 0x04, 0x00, 0x01, 0x82, 0x2f,
00112                  0x2e, 0x42, 0x46, 0x74, 0x0a, 0x00, 0x00, 0x01,
00113                  0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x0a, 0x00,
00114                  0x00, 0x02, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00 };
00115 
00116   for (i = 0; i < count; i++)
00117   {
00118     rv = example_pkt_send(unit, port, data, (int) sizeof(data));
00119 
00120     if (!OPENNSL_SUCCESS(rv))
00121     {
00122       printf("Error Sending Packet: %d.  Error: %s\n", i + 1, opennsl_errmsg(rv));
00123     }
00124     else
00125     {
00126       printf("Transmitted Packet %d of size %zu\n", i + 1, sizeof(data));
00127     }
00128   }
00129 }
00130 /* __doxy_func_body_end__ */
00131 
00132 /*****************************************************************/
00139 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00140 {
00141   opennsl_error_t   rv;
00142   int count;
00143   opennsl_port_t port;
00144   int unit = DEFAULT_UNIT;
00145   int choice;
00146   int index = 0;
00147 
00148   if(strcmp(argv[0], "gdb") == 0)
00149   {
00150     index = 1;
00151   }
00152 
00153   if((argc != (index + 1)) || ((argc > (index + 1)) && (strcmp(argv[index + 1], "--help") == 0))) {
00154     printf("%s\n\r", example_usage);
00155     return OPENNSL_E_PARAM;
00156   }
00157 
00158   /* Initialize the system. */
00159   printf("Initializing the system.\r\n");
00160   rv = opennsl_driver_init((opennsl_init_t *) NULL);
00161 
00162   if(rv != OPENNSL_E_NONE) {
00163     printf("\r\nFailed to initialize the system. Error %s\r\n",
00164         opennsl_errmsg(rv));
00165     return rv;
00166   }
00167 
00168   /* cold boot initialization commands */
00169   rv = example_port_default_config(unit);
00170   if (rv != OPENNSL_E_NONE) {
00171     printf("\r\nFailed to apply default config on ports, rc = %d (%s).\r\n",
00172            rv, opennsl_errmsg(rv));
00173   }
00174 
00175   /* Add ports to default vlan. */
00176   printf("Adding ports to default vlan.\r\n");
00177   rv = example_switch_default_vlan_config(unit);
00178   if(rv != OPENNSL_E_NONE) {
00179     printf("\r\nFailed to add default ports. rv: %s\r\n", opennsl_errmsg(rv));
00180     return rv;
00181   }
00182 
00183   while (1) {
00184     printf("\r\nUser menu: Select one of the following options\r\n");
00185     printf("1. Transmit a packet\n");
00186     printf("2. Display OpenNSL version\n");
00187 #ifdef INCLUDE_DIAG_SHELL
00188     printf("9. Launch diagnostic shell\n");
00189 #endif
00190     printf("0. Quit the application\n");
00191 
00192     if(example_read_user_choice(&choice) != OPENNSL_E_NONE)
00193     {
00194         printf("Invalid option entered. Please re-enter.\n");
00195         continue;
00196     }
00197     switch(choice){
00198 
00199       case 1:
00200       {
00201         printf("\r\nEnter the port on which packet needs to be transmitted.\r\n");
00202         if(example_read_user_choice(&port) != OPENNSL_E_NONE)
00203         {
00204             printf("Invalid option entered. Please re-enter.\n");
00205             continue;
00206         }
00207 
00208         printf("\r\nEnter number of packets to be sent.\r\n");
00209         if(example_read_user_choice(&count) != OPENNSL_E_NONE)
00210         {
00211             printf("Invalid option entered. Please re-enter.\n");
00212             continue;
00213         }
00214 
00215         /* Transmit packet(s) on the specified port */
00216         example_multi_pkt_send(unit, port, count);
00217 
00218         break;
00219       } /* End of case 1 */
00220 
00221       case 2:
00222       {
00223         printf("OpenNSL version: %s\n", opennsl_version_get());
00224         break;
00225       }
00226 
00227 #ifdef INCLUDE_DIAG_SHELL
00228       case 9:
00229       {
00230         opennsl_driver_shell();
00231         break;
00232       }
00233 #endif
00234 
00235       case 0:
00236       {
00237         printf("Exiting the application.\n");
00238         return OPENNSL_E_NONE;
00239       }
00240 
00241       default:
00242         break;
00243     } /* End of switch */
00244   } /* End of while */
00245 
00246   return OPENNSL_E_NONE;
00247 }
00248 /* __doxy_func_body_end__ */
